last_episode_to_air.name: Shutdown
last_episode_to_air.overview: Tess wakes up in an elevator. She is changed and troubled by horrible images from the plants past. The jealousy of Frida due to the romance between Jennifer and Pablo escalates and seeks for violent consequences. The force that has been released seems to spread and Harry makes a horrifying discovery.

name: Dystopia
overview: A group of friends are preparing the Nordic region's largest live event in an abandoned factory deep in the primeval forest. When they turn on the main power, something comes to life that begins to influence the group's behavior...

episodes.name: Blackout
episodes.overview: By accompanying her boyfriend Leo to a LARP held in a closed production plant, Tess is hoping to fix a relationship in crisis. Everyone except Tess are hardcore role-players and she finds it hard to fit in. Despite the prohibition set by janitor Harry, the group decides to start the plants old electrical system and discovers that supernatural powers are brought to life.

episodes.name: Nödfrekvens
episodes.overview: Indigo is starting to act peculiar and Tess meets a threatful man who has broken into the plant. Leo doesn't believe her and the crack between them increases. Everything turns even more complicated as Tess is getting an unexpected reckoning.

episodes.name: Sleepwalker
episodes.overview: Indigo has disappeared and the friends set out on a search around the plant. The strain between Tess and Leo deepens and she finds it difficult to withhold her emotions. It seems someone is opting to carry out some form of sabotage within the factory and Domenica, as she is offering to fix what has been damaged, sets off down the culverts.

episodes.name: Achtung Baby
episodes.overview: Tess feels pressured as her previous affair threatens to be exposed. She decides to leave the LARP, just as something unexpected happens. They embark into a prohibited part of the plant and discovers hidden corners of the plants dark history.

episodes.name: Det inre rummet
episodes.overview: Tess wakes up in an elevator. She is changed and troubled by horrible images from the plants past. The jealousy of Frida due to the romance between Jennifer and Pablo escalates and seeks for violent consequences. The force that has been released seems to spread and Harry makes a horrifying discovery.

episodes.name: Lev och låt leva
episodes.overview: Harry realizes the magnitude and does everything in his powers to get Chrissy to break up the LARP and leave the plant. The relation between Jennifer and Paolo intensifies, but something is off and she is withholding things from the group. Leo, fully aware that Tess cheating has continued, decides to make a drastic move to stop it. Harry get's a call from his employer and decides to weaponize himself.

episodes.name: Radio Silence
episodes.overview: Boys from the area, Neo and Frippe, decides to make a force entry to retaliate. Domenica understands that their lives are in danger and suspects everyone in the group for sabotaging the plant. Tess, keeping her distance, finds Leo to share something that will change everything. Jennifer and Domenica confronts Harry in regards to the history of the plant and realizes that they have to leave immediately.

episodes.name: Shutdown
episodes.overview: Tess wakes up in an elevator. She is changed and troubled by horrible images from the plants past. The jealousy of Frida due to the romance between Jennifer and Pablo escalates and seeks for violent consequences. The force that has been released seems to spread and Harry makes a horrifying discovery.
